transcript:
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haanji.
Executive: Namaste sir.
Customer: Namaste sir.
Executive: Desi textile se bol raha hu aapne kaha tha refund ka issue kiya tha aapne.
Customer: Haan sir maine aapko bola tha na ki aaj main bataunga sir. Abhi thoda sa samay dijiye sir.
Executive: Main kya office mein aaya abhi sara company ke aapko call karenge sir mujhe yaad hai acche se.
Customer: Accha accha chalo theek hai. 
Executive: Hai na sir sham ko baat karte hai hum.
Customer: Ji sir ji.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer raised a refund issue.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the refund issue.

- Customer asked for some time to discuss.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer in the evening.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, call, textile
